metadata.title: Wednesday, 27th March, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    whether the Government is aware that briefcase buyers have began to purchase maize from small scale farmers;

(b)    if so, what urgent measures are being taken to ensure that the Food Reserve Agency (FRA) purchases and mops up the maize produced during the 2023/2024 farming season, so as to ensure the country is food secure; and
(c)    when FRA will announce the floor price of maize.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development and Social Services
parts: (a)    why some beneficiaries of the Social Cash Transfer Programme in Chama North Parliamentary Constituency have not been paid since December, 2023; and
(b)    what urgent measures are being taken to ensure that the beneficiaries are paid, including the arrears.
